title: Claude Code v2.0.69 with Prompt Suggestions and Model Switching
description: December 2025 updates introducing Tab-completion for prompt suggestions, model switching while typing (Alt+P/Option+P), and workflow enhancements.

community_feedback.quote: Claude now suggests prompts to speed up your workflow. Press Tab to accept suggestions
Claude Code feels like magic because it is iterative

title: Codex CLI 0.72.0
description: Update featuring new config API with cleaner loading flow, remote compacting for API-key users, and restored MCP visibility in the TUI.

title: Cursor 2.2 with Debug Mode
description: Major release introducing Debug Mode for transparent AI debugging, Plan Mode improvements, multi-agent judging, pinned chats, and 30% performance improvements.

community_feedback.quote: Cursor 2.2: Debug mode, visual planning, smarter agents, and more
Since the latest update (approx Dec 11/12), the editor has become extremely laggy

title: Multi-Agent Orchestration and Security Updates
description: Early December updates bringing multi-agent orchestration in VS Code, security patches for JetBrains vulnerability, and model transitions including GPT-4.1 as default.

community_feedback.quote: Opus 4.5 Model suddenly disappeared from Copilot options

title: API v3 Updates
description: December 1 updates to Devin's API v3 including new Notes and Playbooks routers for enhanced developer integration.

title: Gemini CLI v0.18.0 with Experimental Permissions
description: November release with experimental permission improvements through new policy engine, enhanced conversation history tracking, and model history features.
